title: What happened to the at a glance?
content: Last week I ask about my Pixel 3 XL's email for my flight will never updated to my calendar, I got some help from the calendar group, it works now, however, after it bing fixed and I can see my flight in the calendar, my device never show my flight status in "at a glance" on my home screen anymore, when the calendar never update my ticket from mail, I can still see the flight status from the "at a glance" on my home screen, dose it have to be fix something than something else broke? I used to be a apple user, please don't force me to go back.
